concept.title: Introduction to This Documentation Project
concept.shortdesc: This topic gives a brief overview on this demo documentation project.

conbody.p: This a sample documentation project that demonstrates my fundamental DITA XML authoring skills. In the process, the project also demonstrates my basic proficiency in using Oxygen XML Author, the industry leading tool used in DITA XML authoring.

The project title is— "Basic Arithmetic Using Windows Calculator". It describes how to conduct the following basic arithmetic operations using Windows' Calculator app—
Addition
Subtraction
Multiplication
Division
